a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Generic chart title to silence errors
Based on the classification and assessment by Skaaning et al. (2015). It does not consider informal restrictions or
legal restrictions based on age, criminal conviction, incompetence, and local residency.
Source: Skaaning et al. (2015); Gapminder (v6); HYDE (v3.2); UN (2022)
